item.description:
Diwali Dhamaka 2012..we are bringing out the lights..you bring the dancing shoes - Get your tickets before we sell out! 8 years in the running..The Biggest Best & Only Bollywood Bhangra Dance Party for 20+ & 30+ somethings - No kids sorry!!
This Diwali we are doing something unique - our first ever Diwali Neon themed party to match diwali colors!! Next year you will see copy cats!! :)
Enjoy Caprice Lounge's vibrant & exotic cocktails. Doors Open @ 10:00 PM. Party till 2 AM. This is our LAST desi party ever at Caprice!! Its been a long run!! So don't miss our final party at Caprice!! At Botson's hottest clubs...we have created the desi scene..come out and show your support!! See tickets and details at www.GenerationDesi.com. RSVP at Generationdesi@gmail.com.
item.name: Diwali Dhamaka 2012..we are bringing out the lights..you bring the dancing shoes
